topic.title: User Home
topic.section:
Once a user has logged in, a User Home link appears in the top navigation bar.

If the user is enrolled as a particular role within the system, links to these roles will appear under the repository's name. The only roles available in the system are those of Site Administrator or Archive Manager.

Account information can be accessed from the User Home page. Clicking the Edit My Profile link will allow the user to edit most information related to their profile, such as first and last name, email address, mailing address, etc. First name, last name, and email address are all mandatory fields. Email addresses must be unique to the system. Users cannot change their usernames post-registration.

Users can change their password by clicking the Change My Password link.

Users can log out by clicking the Log Out link.
